testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to create a new loan plan record via API connection.
testcase.name: When a POST request with valid authorization information and correct data
testcase.system-out: Given The API user sets "api/loanplans/add" path parameters.................passed And The API user prepares a POST request containing the correct data to send to the api loanplans add endpoint.passed When The API user records the response from the api loanplans add endpoint with valid authorization information.passed Then The API user verifies that the status code is 200......................passed And The API user verifies that the remark information in the response body is "success".passed
